Package model

Interface ICalendarService

All Known Subinterfaces:
IMultiCalendarService
All Known Implementing Classes:
CalendarService, MultiCalendarService
public interface ICalendarService
Provides operations for managing events within a calendar.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    ICalendarService.EditMode
    For different EditModes.

  • Method Details

    • addSingleEvent

      void addSingleEvent(String subject, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, String description, String location, boolean isPublic, boolean autoDecline) throws Exception
      Adds a single event to the calendar.
      Parameters:
      subject - the event title
      start - the start date and time
      end - the end date and time
      description - event description
      location - event location
      isPublic - visibility of the event
      autoDecline - whether to auto-decline conflicts
      Throws:
      Exception - if the event cannot be added

    • addRecurringEvent

      void addRecurringEvent(String subject, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, String description, String location, boolean isPublic, Set<DayOfWeek> recurrenceDays, int occurrenceCount, LocalDate recurrenceEndDate, boolean autoDecline) throws Exception
      Adds a recurring event to the calendar.
      Parameters:
      subject - the event title
      start - the start date and time
      end - the end date and time
      description - event description
      location - event location
      isPublic - visibility of the event
      recurrenceDays - recurrence days of the week
      occurrenceCount - number of occurrences
      recurrenceEndDate - date when recurrence ends
      autoDecline - whether to auto-decline conflicts
      Throws:
      Exception - if the event cannot be added

    • getEventsOn

      List<Event> getEventsOn(LocalDate date)
      Gets all events on the specified date.
      Parameters:
      date - the target date
      Returns:
      list of events

    • getAllEvents

      List<Event> getAllEvents()
      Gets all events in the calendar.
      Returns:
      list of events

    • isBusyAt

      boolean isBusyAt(LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Checks if the calendar is busy at the given date and time.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - the target datetime
      Returns:
      true if busy, false otherwise

    • editEvent

      void editEvent(String subject, LocalDateTime from, String property, String newValue, ICalendarService.EditMode mode) throws Exception
      Edits an existing event.
      Parameters:
      subject - event subject
      from - datetime to locate event instance
      property - property to edit
      newValue - new value to apply
      mode - edit mode
      Throws:
      Exception - if the edit fails

    • exportTo

      String exportTo(String format, String path) throws Exception
      Exports the calendar to the specified format and path.
      Parameters:
      format - the export format
      path - the output file path
      Returns:
      export result
      Throws:
      Exception - if export fails

    • importFrom

      String importFrom(String format, String path) throws Exception
      Imports calendar data from a file.
      Parameters:
      format - the format of the file
      path - the file path
      Returns:
      import result
      Throws:
      Exception - if import fails

    • printEventsOn

      String printEventsOn(LocalDate date) throws Exception
      Prints all events on the specified date.
      Parameters:
      date - the target date
      Returns:
      formatted event list
      Throws:
      Exception - if retrieval fails

    • printEventsRange

      String printEventsRange(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end) throws Exception
      Prints all events within a datetime range.
      Parameters:
      start - start datetime
      end - end datetime
      Returns:
      formatted event list
      Throws:
      Exception - if retrieval fails
